lines.text:
[to guard at a white slaver's compund]
Where do you keep the kidnapped girls? Or do you want to lose ten pounds of ugly fat the hard way?

[about her co-workers' flirting]
Just listening to you two is enough to induce diabetes!

[after being scared nearly half to death]
I told you *not* to sneak up on me!

[lifting his head up with a '"squeak" like a machine]
Could you, perchance, tell me where Kenji is?
